# STREAM START/END - by Njna_Grimsdottir

## Description
This one is an example of how on dual servers I set one up to start streaming (which auto starts recording) and on the local obs start recording also.  There's also the reverse of the situation to shut shut the stream down and put all the scenes back to 'Starting/Opening pages' be ready to stream next time.

## Installation

Copy the text from the code box below into the `Import` box in Streamer.bot to add these to your action library:

```

```
